message: Accept my generous offer and we can split the money fairly!
I'll give you a decent chunk, but I want most of it!
Meet me in the middle, Bob! A fair split is the way to go!
I'll give you a smaller chunk, but I'm not budging on my demand!
I'm willing to compromise, but I need a bit more to make it worth my while!
I'm not going to give you a huge chunk, but I'll give you something to make it worth your while... maybe.
I'm getting a bit desperate, Bob, but I'm willing to give you a bigger share to get this over with!
